Articles.Content:
Sierra Space Industries Mission Website Discussion Thread

This thread is a place linked on my website for discussion in relation to my latest content. My on-website commenting system is absolutely terrible unless I get membership and a forum, which costs money. My easier solution is to link back to a thread here. Welcome to that thread. The main header above is linked to the site for your convenience. I will also be posting notifications on new content here so subscribing to this thread is a good way to stay up to date with my content.

Enjoy!

-Sierra
